Perfect for social media bios, it helps you share your content, websites, or services efficiently with your audience, streamlining navigation and enhancing accessibility across platforms.

Description: It is a project aimed at developing an innovative solution for streamlining student attendance tracking in educational institutions. Utilizing Bluetooth technology, this project focuses on creating a system that enables teachers to efficiently mark attendance for large classes, significantly reducing the time and effort traditionally required for this task.
Features: Attendance Record With Mark student Present and Absent
DateWise and Monthly Attendance Tracking
Build Modern Dashboard and integrate Bar and Pie Char
Title: Student Attendence Tracking

Description: This web-based application allows administrators to create and manage courses, track user progress, and deliver educational materials effectively. The frontend is built using React.js, offering a dynamic user interface, while the backend leverages Node.js and Express.js to handle server-side logic and API interactions. MongoDB serves as the database for storing user data, course information, assignments, and more.
Features: User Roles (Administrators, Teachers, Students)
Course Management (Create, Modify, Delete Courses)
Content Uploads (PDFs, Videos)
Student Enrollment and Progress Tracking
Secure Authentication using JWT
Role-Based Access Control
Assignment Submission and Grading
Quiz Management
Discussion Forums for Student Interaction
Responsive Design for Mobile and Desktop Access
Integration with Cloud Services for Media Storage
Title: MERN Stack Learning Management System

Description: It is designed to create an engaging and visually appealing platform for showcasing Non-Fungible Tokens (NFTs). Built with React.js, this project emphasizes a modern user interface that attracts potential buyers and art enthusiasts.
Features: Complex Animaitions in React
use confetti in React JS for awesome background effects
Uses of Lazy and suspense in reactJS to make components load faster
Title: NFT Collection Landing Page

Description: The URL Shortener React App is a user-friendly web application designed to simplify the process of shortening long URLs, making them easier to share and manage. Built with React.js, this application offers a modern interface and efficient functionality, catering to individuals and businesses looking to enhance their online presence.
Features: User-Friendly Interface for URL input
Real-Time URL Shortening without page reloads
Link Management Dashboard for viewing, editing, and deleting links
Analytics Tracking for monitoring clicks on shortened links
Custom Short Links creation for enhanced branding
Responsive Design for seamless use across devices
Secure processing of URLs to ensure user safety
Fast response times for efficient user experience
Title: URL Shortener App
